name: Appal v1.7
description:
Story :

Micro Manager, in his desperation to gain the power of the golden apples has begun to take control of planet Appalmoeshapje. As Micro Manager's influence grows, Appal finds not only the inhabitants of, but the very world is turning against him! - Help Appal to navigate through each level, avoiding danger, collecting as many golden apples as you can before finally facing Micro Manager and restoring peace to the world.

Controls : 

Game :

W  / up arrow : Jump / Stick to Ceiling ( Stick to the ceiling - by holding  up /  W - But be careful, you can't move sideways when 'stuck' to a surface )

A / left arrow : Left 

D / right arrow : Right

S / down arrow : Crouch

Level Editor : 

E : Draw with same tile under cursor

/ : Assign command to tile ( advanced topic )

Q + M : Toggle Editor / Play Mode 

R : Rotate current tile

1 .. 7 : Toggle Tile / Category to draw with

If you want to try my custom level, the link is in the 'Downloadable' section : game_customLevel
